title: Announcement, From Artists' Studios/ Current Work: Andrea Eis, Stephanie Sarris, Carol Schramm, 1988
title_raw: From Artists' Studios/ Current Work: Andrea Eis, Stephanie Sarris, Carol Schramm
signed: Signature imprinted in black ink, verso, across center: DESIGN: EDWARD FELLA, VACANT, VACATED, VACATIONING
inscribed:
Recto: Imprinted in black, center, right: FROM/ ARTISTS/ STUDIOS/*/ CURRENT/ WORK; across center, left: AND REA EIS/ ST EPH ANIE SARR IS/ CAR OL SCH RAMM; across center right edge, running downward, sideways: STUDIO VISIT PROGRAM CURATORS:/ MARYANN WILKINSON ASSISTANT CURATOR DEPARTMENT OF 20TH CENTURY ART/ DETROIT INSTITUTE OF ARTS/ JOSEPH WESNERARTIST/ EDUCATOR CENTER FOR CREATIVE STUDIES; across lower left edge, running upward, sideways: DETROIT/ FOCUS; running downward, sideways: GALLERY/ 643 Beaubien, 3rd Floor Detroit, Michigan 48226; diagonally across lower left quadrant, running upward: Gallery Hours:/ Wednesday-Saturday/ Noon-6 p.m.; across lower left corner: (313) 962-9025; across lower edge, center: JUNE 30- JULY 301988/ OPENING: THURSDAY JUNE 30 6-8:30 PM/ 7 PM: ARTS FOUNDATION OF MICHIGAN AWARDS PRESENTATION
Verso: Imprinted in black across lower left quadrant: DETROIT FOCUS GALLERY/ 743 BEAUBIEN 3RD FLOOR/ DETROIT, MICHIGAN48226/ ACROSS FROM THE BRICKTOWN PEOPLEMOVER STATION/ WITH THE SUPPORT OF THE NATIONAL ENDOWMENT FOR THE ARTS/ THE MICHIGAN COUNCIL FOR THE ARTS/ DETROIT COUNCIL FOR THE ARTS/ ARTS FOUNDATION OF MICHIGAN; across lower right quadrant: NONPROFITORG./ BULK RATE/ U.S. POSTAGE/ PAID/ DETROIT,MICHIGAN/ PERMIT NO 2960

* The "/" is included in the text.
description:
Poster announcement printed in black for Detroit Focus Gallery exhibition, designed to be mailed.  Text in a variety of sizes, styles, throughout.   
Recto:  Across upper third of sheet, [printed] sketch of house.  At each corner, feather-like embellishment.  Across center, text giving exhibition title, participating artists, curators.  Across lower left edge, text givng location, contact information.  Across lower edge, center, text giving dates, reception information.     
Verso: Across upper half of sheet, image of sail.  Lower left corner, feather-like embellishment. Across lower half of sheet, text giving sponsor and mailing information.

tombstone.epitaph:
Announcement, From Artists' Studios/ Current Work: Andrea Eis, Stephanie Sarris, Carol Schramm, 1988. Offset lithograph on cream paper.. 
Gift of Edward Fella. 1995-42-32
